ko_situation: 축제 준비를 더 열심히 해서 친구들과 친해지고 싶었는데, 그때는 너무 부끄러움을 많이 탔어.
situation: I wanted to work harder during the festival preparation to get closer to my friends, but I was too shy back then.

dialogue.ko_utter: 동아리 활동에서 더 적극적으로 참여하지 않은 게 아쉬워.
dialogue.utter: I regret not being more active in my club activities.

dialogue.ko_utter: 어떤 활동을 말하는 거야?
dialogue.utter: Which activities are you talking about?

dialogue.ko_utter: 예전에 학교 축제 준비할 때, 좀 더 열심히 했어야 했는데, 너무 소극적이었어.
dialogue.utter: When we were preparing for the school festival, I should’ve worked harder, but I was too passive.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그때 다 같이 열심히 준비했지. 네가 좀 더 참여했다면 더 좋은 추억이 됐을 거야.
dialogue.utter: We all worked hard back then. If you had participated more, it would’ve been an even better memory.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 그때 친구들과 더 많이 어울렸더라면 좋았을 텐데, 후회돼.
dialogue.utter: Exactly. I wish I had spent more time with my friends back then. I regret it.

dialogue.ko_utter: 지금이라도 그 친구들과 다시 만나서 추억을 쌓아보는 건 어때?
dialogue.utter: How about meeting up with those friends again and making new memories?

dialogue.ko_utter: 좋은 생각이야. 그때의 아쉬움을 조금이라도 달랠 수 있을 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: That’s a good idea. It might help ease the regret from back then.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 그렇게 해서 더 좋은 추억을 만들어 가자.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, let’s create better memories together now.

ko_situation: 나도 어릴 때 예체능을 더 했으면 지금은 달라졌을까?
situation: Would my life have been different if I had pursued more arts or sports as a child?

dialogue.ko_utter: 어릴 때 예체능을 배우지 않은 게 아쉬워.
dialogue.utter: I regret not learning arts or sports when I was younger.

dialogue.ko_utter: 무슨 예체능을 배우고 싶었는데?
dialogue.utter: What kind of arts or sports did you want to learn?

dialogue.ko_utter: 피아노나 미술을 배워보고 싶었는데, 당시에는 학업이 우선이라 생각했어.
dialogue.utter: I wanted to learn piano or art, but I thought schoolwork was more important back then.

dialogue.ko_utter: 나도 비슷해. 음악이나 미술 같은 예술 분야를 경험해보지 못한 게 후회돼.
dialogue.utter: I feel the same. I regret not experiencing music or art more when I had the chance.

dialogue.ko_utter: 지금이라도 취미로 배워볼까 생각 중이야.
dialogue.utter: I'm thinking about learning it as a hobby now.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그거 좋은 생각이야. 늦었다고 생각할 때가 가장 빠른 때라고 하잖아.
dialogue.utter: That’s a great idea. They say the best time to start is when you think it’s too late.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 어릴 때처럼 전문적으로는 아니더라도, 조금씩 배워보고 싶어.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, maybe not as seriously as when I was younger, but I want to learn little by little.

dialogue.ko_utter: 나도 같이 해볼까? 함께 시작하면 더 재미있을 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: Should I join you? It might be more fun if we start together.

ko_situation: 달라진 친구를 보며 씁쓸함을 느껴.
situation: I feel a sense of bitterness seeing how much my friend has changed.

dialogue.ko_utter: 오랜만에 만난 친구가 예전과 많이 달라진 걸 보니 마음이 좀 씁쓸해.
dialogue.utter: It's been a while since I saw my friend, and seeing how much they've changed makes me feel a bit bitter.

dialogue.ko_utter: 무슨 일이 있었는데?
dialogue.utter: What happened?

dialogue.ko_utter: 어릴 때는 정말 친했는데, 내가 큰 잘못을 해서 절교했어. 우연히 마주쳤는데 참 어색하더라고.
dialogue.utter: We were really close when we were young, but I made a big mistake, and we stopped talking. When we ran into each other, it felt really awkward.

dialogue.ko_utter: 나도 그런 경험이 있어. 어릴 때는 조그만 일에도 크게 상처받을 수 있지.
dialogue.utter: I've had a similar experience. When we're young, even small things can leave a big scar.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그 친구와 예전처럼 지내고 싶었는데, 이제는 거리감이 느껴져서 아쉬워. 그때 내가 그랬으면 안 됐어.
dialogue.utter: I wanted to go back to how things were, but now I feel distance between us, and it's sad. I shouldn't have acted the way I did back then.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그래도 그 친구와의 추억은 변하지 않을 거야. 지금의 변화를 받아들이는 것도 중요해.
dialogue.utter: But the memories you shared with that friend won't change. It's also important to accept the changes in the present.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 새롭게 다시 관계를 쌓아가고 싶은데 거절당할까봐 두려워.
dialogue.utter: You're right. I want to rebuild our relationship, but I'm scared of being rejected.

dialogue.ko_utter: 괜찮아. 진실하게 다가간다면 서로의 변화를 존중하면서 다시 가까워질 수 있을 거야.
dialogue.utter: It's okay. If you approach sincerely, you can both respect the changes and get closer again.

ko_situation: 인턴 경험을 못 해본 게 너무 후회돼.
situation: I really regret not having internship experience.

dialogue.ko_utter: 대학 때 인턴 기회를 놓친 게 지금도 아쉬워.
dialogue.utter: I still regret missing the chance to intern during college.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그때 왜 못하게 됐어?
dialogue.utter: Why couldn't you do it back then?

dialogue.ko_utter: 준비가 부족해서 지원하지 못했거든. 그때 경험을 쌓았으면 지금 더 도움이 됐을 텐데.
dialogue.utter: I wasn't prepared, so I didn't apply. If I had gained experience back then, it would have been really helpful now.

dialogue.ko_utter: 나도 비슷한 경험이 있어. 그때 놓친 기회가 지금까지도 아쉽더라.
dialogue.utter: I've had a similar experience. I still regret the opportunities I missed back then.

dialogue.ko_utter: 지금은 실무 경험을 쌓기가 더 어려워서 그때가 더 후회돼.
dialogue.utter: Now it's harder to gain hands-on experience, so I regret it even more.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그래도 지금부터라도 새로운 기회를 찾아보면 될 거야. 인생은 계속 도전의 연속이니까.
dialogue.utter: But you can still look for new opportunities now. Life is full of continuous challenges.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 조금 더 적극적으로 기회를 찾아보려고 해.
dialogue.utter: You're right. I'm going to try to actively seek opportunities now.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응원할게. 이번엔 놓치지 말고 꼭 잡아봐.
dialogue.utter: I'm rooting for you. Don't miss it this time—grab that opportunity.

ko_situation: 할머니를 오랜만에 봐서 참 정겨웠어.
situation: It was really heartwarming to see my grandmother after a long time.

dialogue.ko_utter: 얼마 전 오랜만에 할머니 댁에 다녀왔는데, 예전 그대로 계셔서 참 반가웠어.
dialogue.utter: I recently visited my grandmother's house after a long time, and it was so nice to see her just as she was before.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그랬구나. 할머니는 항상 그 자리에 계셔서 마음이 따뜻해지지.
dialogue.utter: That's great to hear. Just knowing that she's always there warms your heart, doesn't it?

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 어릴 때 할머니랑 같이 밭에서 일하던 기억도 나고, 정말 소중한 시간들이었어.
dialogue.utter: Yes, I remember working in the fields with her when I was a kid. Those were really precious times.

dialogue.ko_utter: 할머니가 해주신 음식도 여전히 맛있었어?
dialogue.utter: Was the food she made still as delicious as you remember?

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 그 손맛은 정말 변하지 않더라. 할머니의 정성이 담긴 음식이라 그런지 더 맛있게 느껴졌어.
dialogue.utter: Yes, her cooking hasn't changed at all. It tasted even better because of the love she puts into it.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 시간들이 참 귀중한 것 같아. 할머니와의 추억을 더 많이 쌓아가면 좋겠다.
dialogue.utter: Those moments are really precious. I hope you can make even more memories with her.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그래서 앞으로는 더 자주 찾아뵈려고 해. 할머니가 많이 기뻐하시더라고.
dialogue.utter: That's why I'm planning to visit her more often. She was really happy to see me.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응원할게. 할머니와 함께하는 시간이 너에게도 큰 힘이 될 거야.
dialogue.utter: I'm cheering you on. The time you spend with her will be a great source of strength for you too.

ko_situation: 공원에서 산책할 때마다 뵙는 할아버지랑 정들었어.
situation: I've grown close to an elderly man I see every time I go for a walk in the park.

dialogue.ko_utter: 집 근처 작은 공원이 있잖아. 매일 산책하러 가는데, 거기서 만나는 할아버지랑 정이 들었어.
dialogue.utter: There's a small park near my house. I go for a walk there every day, and I've gotten close to an elderly man I meet there.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그 할아버지랑 자주 이야기 나누나 봐?
dialogue.utter: Do you talk to him often?

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 처음엔 그냥 인사만 나누다가 요즘은 서로 안부도 물어보고 이야기 나누게 됐어.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, at first we just exchanged greetings, but now we ask about each other's well-being and have conversations.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 작은 인연들이 참 소중하지. 할아버지도 너랑 이야기 나누는 걸 즐기실 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: Those small connections are really precious. I'm sure he enjoys talking with you too.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 매일 뵙다 보니까 자연스럽게 정이 들어서, 이제는 못 뵙는 날이면 걱정될 정도야.
dialogue.utter: Exactly. Seeing him every day has made me grow attached, and now I worry when I don't see him.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 관계가 참 따뜻한 것 같아. 할아버지와의 인연을 잘 이어가봐.
dialogue.utter: That sounds like such a warm relationship. Keep nurturing that connection with him.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그래야겠어. 할아버지께서도 내일 또 보자고 항상 웃으시며 말해주시거든.
dialogue.utter: I should. He always smiles and says, 'See you tomorrow,' whenever we part.

dialogue.ko_utter: 너도 할아버지께 큰 힘이 되고 있을 거야. 계속 그렇게 좋은 관계를 이어가길 바랄게.
dialogue.utter: I'm sure you're a great source of comfort for him too. I hope you continue to maintain that good relationship.

ko_situation: 아침마다 마주치는 기사 아저씨랑 정든 것 같아.
situation: I feel like I've grown close to the bus driver I see every morning.

dialogue.ko_utter: 매일 아침 버스를 타는데, 기사 아저씨랑 정이 들어서 가끔 커피도 사드려.
dialogue.utter: I take the bus every morning, and I've gotten close to the driver, so I sometimes buy him coffee.

dialogue.ko_utter: 정말? 그런 작은 인연이 참 소중한 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: Really? Small connections like that are really precious.

dialogue.ko_utter: 처음엔 그냥 인사만 했는데, 이제는 아저씨가 먼저 안부를 물어봐 주셔서 자연스럽게 친해졌어.
dialogue.utter: At first, I just greeted him, but now he asks how I'm doing first, so we naturally became close.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그렇게 친해진 사람들이 있으면 아침마다 기분이 좋아질 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: It must feel great to have someone like that to greet every morning.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 그래서 요즘은 버스 타는 시간이 기다려질 정도야. 아저씨도 내 커피를 좋아하시더라고.
dialogue.utter: Exactly. These days, I even look forward to getting on the bus. He really likes the coffee I get him.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 관계가 참 따뜻하네. 아저씨도 너에게 많은 정을 느끼고 있을 거야.
dialogue.utter: That's such a warm relationship. I'm sure he feels a lot of affection toward you too.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 것 같아. 다음엔 아저씨가 좋아하는 간식도 준비해볼까 생각 중이야.
dialogue.utter: I think so. I'm thinking of preparing his favorite snack next time.

dialogue.ko_utter: 좋은 생각이야. 그런 소소한 나눔이 일상에 큰 행복을 줄 수 있잖아.
dialogue.utter: That's a great idea. Small gestures like that can bring so much happiness to daily life.

ko_situation: 회사 청소 아주머니랑 매일 보다 보니 정든 것 같아.
situation: I've grown close to the cleaning lady at work since I see her every day.

dialogue.ko_utter: 회사 청소해주시는 아주머니랑 매일 인사 나누다 보니 정이 들었어.
dialogue.utter: I've grown close to the cleaning lady at work because we greet each other every day.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 인연이 참 따뜻하지. 아주머니도 너를 많이 아끼실 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: That's such a warm connection. I bet she really cares about you too.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 요즘은 아주머니께서 먼저 내 건강도 챙겨주시고, 간식도 나눠주셔.
dialogue.utter: Exactly. These days, she even checks on my health and shares snacks with me.

dialogue.ko_utter: 아주머니와의 그런 관계가 참 소중해 보인다. 작은 인사에서 시작된 정이니까.
dialogue.utter: That relationship seems really special. It all started with a simple greeting.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 그래서 나도 아주머니 생신 때 작은 선물을 드렸더니 정말 좋아하시더라.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, so I gave her a small gift on her birthday, and she was really happy.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 마음이 전달되면 더 가까워질 수 있지. 아주머니께서도 정말 고마워하셨겠어.
dialogue.utter: When those feelings are conveyed, it can bring you even closer. She must have really appreciated it.

ko_situation: 동네 카페에 정들어서 단골이 됐어.
situation: I've become a regular at a local cafe because I've grown attached to it.

dialogue.ko_utter: 동네 작은 카페 사장님이랑 매일 인사하다 보니 정이 들어서, 요즘은 단골손님이 됐어.
dialogue.utter: I grew close to the owner of a small local cafe after greeting them every day, and now I'm a regular.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그 카페 자주 가는구나. 사장님도 너를 반가워하시겠어.
dialogue.utter: You must go to that cafe often. The owner must be happy to see you.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 처음엔 그냥 커피만 사 마셨는데, 요즘은 사장님이 내 취향도 알아주셔서 특별히 만들어 주시기도 해.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, at first I just bought my coffee, but now the owner knows my preferences and sometimes makes special drinks for me.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 특별한 대우를 받으면 정말 기분이 좋을 것 같아. 사장님과도 가까워졌겠네.
dialogue.utter: That must feel great to get special treatment like that. You must be getting closer to the owner too.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 그래서 요즘은 사장님이랑 이런저런 얘기도 나누고, 카페에 오래 머물게 돼.
dialogue.utter: Exactly. These days, I chat with the owner and end up staying longer at the cafe.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 관계가 참 소중해 보인다. 카페가 더 따뜻한 공간으로 느껴지겠어.
dialogue.utter: That relationship seems really special. The cafe must feel like a warmer place now.

ko_situation: 꽃집 사장님이랑 오랫동안 정들었어.
situation: I've grown attached to the owner of the flower shop over time.

dialogue.ko_utter: 자주 가는 꽃집 사장님이랑 정이 들어서 요즘은 꽃 고르는 것도 도와주셔.
dialogue.utter: I’ve gotten close to the flower shop owner I visit often, and now they help me choose flowers.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그 꽃집 자주 가나 봐. 사장님도 너를 반가워하시겠네.
dialogue.utter: You must visit that flower shop often. I bet the owner is always happy to see you.

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 처음엔 그냥 지나가다 들르곤 했는데, 이제는 사장님이 먼저 알아봐 주시고 추천도 해주셔.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, at first I just dropped by occasionally, but now the owner recognizes me and makes recommendations.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 인연이 참 따뜻하네. 사장님도 너와 함께 일하는 게 즐거우실 것 같아.
dialogue.utter: That's such a warm connection. I'm sure the owner enjoys interacting with you.

dialogue.ko_utter: 맞아. 그래서 요즘은 꽃 살 때마다 사장님과 이야기 나누는 시간이 더 즐거워졌어.
dialogue.utter: Exactly. These days, buying flowers has become more enjoyable because of the chats I have with the owner.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 시간이 소중해. 꽃을 사는 것뿐만 아니라, 사장님과의 정이 더해져서 특별한 경험이 되겠어.
dialogue.utter: Those moments are precious. It's not just about buying flowers, but also the bond you share with the owner that makes it special.

ko_situation: 운동하러 갈 때마다 매일 같은 강아지가 보여서 친해졌어!
situation: I became close with a dog I see every day when I go for my workout.

dialogue.ko_utter: 매일 아침 운동하러 가는 공원에서 만나는 강아지랑 정이 들었어.
dialogue.utter: I’ve gotten attached to a dog I meet every morning at the park when I go for my workout.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그 강아지 주인과도 친해졌겠네?
dialogue.utter: You must have also gotten close to the dog’s owner, right?

dialogue.ko_utter: 응, 처음엔 그냥 지나치곤 했는데, 이제는 강아지가 먼저 와서 반겨줘.
dialogue.utter: Yeah, at first I just walked past, but now the dog comes to greet me first.

dialogue.ko_utter: 그런 순간들이 참 소중하지. 강아지랑 교감이 생긴 거니까.
